Reviews.Title: Good performance at a fair price.
Reviews.Author: R. W. Mytton
Reviews.Content: I returned an LG LCD TV and replaced it with the same size LCD in a Sharp.The reason I returned LG was the limited viewing angle and I didn't feelthat the picture quality matched that of another Sharp that we have in another room. Both Sharps are the same size (20") LCDs,but different models,they're great.The viewing angle is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Great sound and viewing angle
Reviews.Author: Declan Mantis
Reviews.Content: This product is excellent value for the money. Many 20" LCD tv's have grossly inadequate sound, requiring you to hook them into an audio system. This tv can be comfortably seen by anyone at several angles in a 25' by 40' room, and needs no auxilliary sound system. I love this product.

Reviews.Title: A great TV
Reviews.Author: T. Kendall
Reviews.Content: I use this in a bedroom.  It is sharp and very reliable.  I particularly like the fact that it automatically shows closed captioning when you mute the sound so you can still see what is being said.  It also has a great feature to allow the sound to play and turn off the picture.  That is great for the music channels on cable.  Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Superb quality and performance
Reviews.Author: Mtnwmn
Reviews.Content: This TV delivers a very sharp picture with crisp colors. It's a great size for an office or small room; mine is mounted with a swing arm on the wall. The only minor quibble is the power and video cords are black so they are very obvious -- would be nicer if they were white.

20-inch LCD TV for smaller rooms or installing in kitchen; includes stand

Two stereo speakers, 2.1 watts apiece (4.2 watts total)
